R

recieveDamage(int) - Method in class models.monsters.base.Monster
this method takes in an int damage and subtracts it from current HP.
rnJesus - Static variable in class models.dice.Die
the random generator for all die instances.
rnJesus - Static variable in class models.potions.base.Potion
the Random object that generates the random number for all instances of potion.
roll() - Method in class models.dice.Die
this rolls a die and sets the current value to what was rolled and returns the current value.
rollDice(int, int) - Method in class models.dice.DiceBag
this method rolls a specified amount of dice of a specified size and returns the result.
rollDice(int, int, int) - Method in class models.dice.DiceBag
this method rolls a specified amount of dice of a specified size and then adds a modifier to the result and returns that value.
rollDie(int) - Method in class models.dice.DiceBag
this method rolls a single die and returns the result.
rollDie(int, int) - Method in class models.dice.DiceBag
this method rolls a single die and adds a modifier and returns the result.
rollHero() - Method in class controllers.GameMaster
generates a hero based on randomly rolled attributes.
rollInitiative() - Method in class controllers.GameMaster
this method rolls and sets the initiative of every monster in the game.
